title: Vintage 1950's ink stamp? font continued
content:
attaching a close up of the smaller letters...if not an exact match, any suggestions for some similar fonts please?

Thanks

Steve

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021233332/http:/typophile.com/files/image_79.jpg) | 84.52 KB |
author: Kilgore Trout 23

comments.content: Still clueless... Can't recognize it either. Reminds me of those fonts used for comic books though. May be having a look to both [Blambot](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021233332/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Blambot) and [Comicraft](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021233332/http:/www.myfonts.com/foundry/Comicraft) font collections might worth a shot...
Something really close is Faxfont Tone from T-26

Bojev- that's not far off at all- nice one!

ryuk- it does definitely have a comic feel to it, I agree. will have a look at the leads you gave me.

Really appreciate both your help. Thank you
Damn Bob, that's a great find, almost matching and surely the closest so far.
